client.model

Class Client

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.model.Client

  • public class Client
extends Object
    Represents a client who can connect/disconnect to the server and chat with other people on the server
    Version:
    0.4
    Author:
    Peng Wang, Andro Stotts, Bryce Filler, Max Hinson

      • connectServer

        public int connectServer(String IP,
                         String userName,
                         String password)
        ConnectServer method takes server IP address parameter to connect the specific server and takes client userName and password in order to check login authority
        Parameters:
        IP - Server IP address
        userName - userName
        password - user's password associate with the useruserName
        Returns:
        boolean true when useruserName and password are valid, otherwise false

      • disconnectServer

        public void disconnectServer()
        disconnectServer method is used for disconnecting the client with the server

      • checkAuthority

        public int checkAuthority(String s)
        checkAuthority method is used for checking if the useruserName and password are valid
        Parameters:
        s - the combination of useruserName and password
        Returns:
        boolean true when the server returns null, otherwise false

      • parseContactList

        public String[] parseContactList(String s)
        Parse the contact list
        Parameters:
        s - a contact list represented by a string (eg. "Peng Wang:Andro Stotts")
        Returns:
        array of strings that has contact userNames seperated

      • parseReceivingMsg

        public String[] parseReceivingMsg(String s)
        Parse the receiving message from the server
        Parameters:
        s - received message
        Returns:
        array of strings

      • sendMsg

        public void sendMsg(String s)
        sendMsg is the method that used for send a text message to the server
        Parameters:
        s - text message

      • sendIM

        public void sendIM(String msg)
        Method used to send a message to a single User. This is the preferred method to use when sending a single message to another User Appends nickName to the front of the message to adhere to the server's message parsing requirements
        Parameters:
        msg - String that contains the message to be sent as well as the relevant server information (See ClientController.sendIM())

      • addContact

        public void addContact(Contact newc)
        Method to add a Contact to ArrayList contacts.
        Parameters:
        nn - a String representing the nickname of the contact to be added.

      • updateContact

        public void updateContact(String contact,
                          boolean status)
        Method to modify online status of a Contact.
        Parameters:
        contact - The nickname of the contact to modify
        status - A boolean representing online status.

      • sendChatRoomRegistration

        public void sendChatRoomRegistration(String reg)
        Method to send a ChatRoom registration request to the Server. Sends the registration message to the server.
        Parameters:
        reg - a String constructed from the ClientController for proper message structure.
